entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
